= Project Description =

== Introduction ==

Project tentatively named pManagr is a way to manage parallel projects. Examples are the Netflix algorithm contest and Computer Science class projects.

An administrator will set project deadlines, milestones, and tasks per milestone to complete. They can also set up general meetings, where all involved people are invited. These can be used for Q&A sessions and the such.
